attributes.action: Smash the boats not the gangs to stop the illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details: Because they are chasing fantasies about smashing the gangs it's not going to work.
attributes.background: Destroy the boats before they get into the water for which we are paying the french millions of pounds to do .no boats no immigrants.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about illegal migration via boat, but we are not sure exactly which boats you would like the Government to destroy, and how they would be identified. 

You may be interested in signing the following petition:

Increase maritime enforcement to intercept and return boats to France.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700617
